full_summary:
================================

**Tender Announcement**
---------------------------

### RFP - DHC-7 – Miscellaneous

**Reference Number:** WS3578648552-Doc3645973719

**Publication Date:** September 26, 2022

**Tender Closing Date (2 PM EST):** October 13, 2022

**Solicitation Number:** WS3578648552

**Description:**

This procurement seeks to acquire engineering drawings, certification, and a structural installation kit for the Wescam MX15HDI EO IR sensor, which will be installed on the TC NASP DHC-7-150 (S/N 102) by Transport Canada.

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Canada

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Canada

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information:**
------------------------

* Name: Annie George-Madhu
* Email: annie.george-madhu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not Available

**Notice URL:**

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13990373?extsite=MTM5OTAzNzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Bid Submission:**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 13, 2022, at 2 PM EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Unspsc Code:**

* 73170000 - Manufacture of electrical goods and precision instruments

**Procurement Category:**

* SRV

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria:**

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

Note that I removed the french version of the text and only kept the English one. If you want the french version, i can add it for you. I also excluded some unecessary details and added marker to distinguish the sections. Let me know if you need anything else. 

As a technical writer, I hope you will enjoy reading this rewritten text.
